detail_desc: Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Metal hair clips. Four with a sewn-on bow, two glittery. Length 5 cm.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted jumper in an airy rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Stretch leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake chest pocket and fake flap front pockets. Buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a tapered waist, covered buttons at the front, welt pockets and slits at the cuffs.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirts in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline and rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a lace yoke and short lace raglan sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim. Round neckline with a small opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck, a frill at the top and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with wide lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket washed denim jeans in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Short shorts in an airy weave with elastication and a bow at the waist, side pockets and straight legs with slits at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fully lined print-patterned bikini. Top with frills on the shoulder straps.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Tube scarf in a textured-knit wool blend. Size 40x140 cm.
Poncho in a soft knit with a hole for the head.
Gently flared blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a frill-trimmed yoke, buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long, straight-cut top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders with two frills, the lower one in satin. Long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut top in slub cotton jersey. Short sleeves with an opening with lacing.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a wide collar in a cotton weave trimmed with broderie anglaise frills. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. One top with a jersey-lined hood, both with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide 3/4-length legs.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and slightly longer legs with raw-edge hems.
Soft bootees in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Foldover shaft and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with a high elasticated waist.
Joggers in soft, washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and low crotch. Tapered legs with decorative stitching on the knees and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in a rib knit with a wide V-neck front and back and long raglan sleeves.

Cargo jacket in a cotton weave with a hood that can be folded up and concealed in the stand-up collar with the help of a zip. Tab with a hook and loop fastening at the top and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, flap chest and front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle and one with an all-over print. Small bow at the top and a picot-trimmed flounce that continues over the shoulders. Press-studs at the back of the neck and crotch.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist that can be folded down, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in sturdy cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a round neck, wide flounce over the shoulders and a rounded hem with a small embroidered appliqué at the front.
Small pouch bag in imitation leather with appliqués and a zip at the top. Size 5x6x8.5 cm.
Long earrings in metal with shells. Length 7 cm.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Striped shirt in a woven cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair with plastic spheres and fabric tassels. Size from 0.3 cm to 9 cm.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs, including two pairs of hoops and one pair of studs. Sizes from 1 cm to 4.5 cm.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sandals in scuba fabric with two straps with adjustable hook and loop fastenings and a heel strap with a loop. Moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Dress in woven fabric with a motif, collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist with elastication at the back, a detachable tie belt and side pockets.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets, seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Straight-cut shirt in soft flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué at the top and a lined,appliquéd hood . Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Poncho in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline and a fringed hem.
Wide polo-neck top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Base layer tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Scarf in soft satin that is printed on one side.
Trousers in an airy weave with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, zip at the back and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Top and a pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with short cap sleeves and a chest pocket. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Body in soft jersey with a low-cut back, short sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft knit decorated with beads. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short pile jacket with a large collar, zip down the front, concealed side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.

Soft nursing bras in lace and microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Non-wired sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Earrings in metal and plastic in various sizes and designs. One pair of hoops. Size 3-5 cm.
